price: 10. Wuxuu ahaaday qalbigii Muuse hooyadi mid (ka) maran (arrin kaloo dhan ka fekerka wiilkeeda Muuse ma ahee) waxayna ku sigatay inay kashifto (arrinkiisa) haddaanaan adkaynin qalbigeeda si ay uga mid ahaato mu’miniinta.
arabic: وَأَصۡبَحَ فُؤَادُ أُمِّ مُوسَىٰ فَٰرِغًاۖ إِن كَادَتۡ لَتُبۡدِي بِهِۦ لَوۡلَآ أَن رَّبَطۡنَا عَلَىٰ قَلۡبِهَا لِتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-aṣbaḥa fuādu ummi mūsā fārighan in kādat latub'dī bihi lawlā an rabaṭnā ʿalā qalbihā litakūna mina al-mu'minīna
